Description.Text: Facilities The air-conditioned hotel comprises a total of 44 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a playroom, a conference room and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the establishment. Rooms All rooms offer a mini fridge, a tea/coffee station, a safe and WiFi. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The terrace is a great place to while away the time. Additional services include an entertainment programme for children, offering numerous activities. Meals It is possible to order breakfast. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: VISA and MasterCard.
